sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export const IssueForm = ({addIssue, open}) => { const [value, setValue] = useState({ issue: "", line: "", severity: "", priority: "", statusKey: "", component: "", assignee: "" }) const [isValid, setIsValid] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { const { issue, line, component, priority, severity, statusKey, assignee } = value if(issue !=="" && line !=="" && component !=="" && priority !=="" && severity !=="" && statusKey !=="" && assignee !==""){ setIsValid(true) }else{ setIsValid(false) } }, [value, isValid]) const handleValidation = () =>{ let message Object.entries(value).map(x=> x[1] === "" ? message = x[0] : "" ) if(!isValid) alert(` Please fill ${message} field to submit the issue`) } const handleChange = e =>{ const { name, value } = e.target setValue((prevVal) => ({ ...prevVal, [name]: value })) } const handleSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault() const { issue, line, component, priority, severity, statusKey, assignee } = value if(issue && line && component && priority && severity && statusKey && assignee){ addIssue(issue, line, component, priority, severity, statusKey, assignee) setValue({ issue: "", line: "", severity: "", priority: "", statusKey: "", component: "", assignee: "", }) setIsValid(()=>false) }else{ handleValidation(e) return } } const handleButton = (text)=>{ let buttonClass = open? 'active' : 'inactive' text = buttonClass return text } return (
) }
